snippet: While all households are paying a lower federal tax burden than 30 years ago, the rich have gotten richer, and their share of all federal taxes has grown.
lead_paragraph: While all households are paying a lower federal tax burden than 30 years ago, the rich have gotten richer, and their share of all federal taxes has grown.

headline.seo: Growing Tax Burden for the Wealthiest
headline.main: Growing Tax Burden for the Wealthiest
